attributes.comment:
USCIS-2006-0044, Adjustment of the Immigration Benefit Application/ Petition and
Biometric Fee Schedule, USCIS-2006-0044-0001

I am writing to comment about the proposed increase to the fees with regard to
immigration. As a parent in the process of adopting an orphan from abroad, I
object to the increase in fees. Expenses for adoption are high, and the fees from
USCIS are significant, especially when adoptions often take longer than the 18
months that I-171H allows for. Quite often pre-adoptive parents will take several
years to complete adoptions, and those that don't complete before the 18 months
will have to pay all the fees for USCIS multiple times. Please reconsider
increasing this fee!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
